list_definition.definition: something used as a basis of measurement

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The kilogram is the international standard of weight.

list_definition.definition: a basis for judging quality, or a level of excellence aimed at, required or achieved

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: You can’t judge an amateur artist’s work by the same standards as you would judge that of a trained artist
His performance did not reach the required standard.

list_definition.definition: a flag or carved figure etc fixed to a pole and carried eg at the front of an army going into battle.
(accepted as) normal or usual; The Post Office likes the public to use a standard size of envelope.
